headerDisplay: Homebridge Plugin for the RockBand StageKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

eventfile.title: Eventfile
eventfile.description: The eventfile that represents the StageKit.

fog_pulse_seconds.title: Fog Pulse Seconds
fog_pulse_seconds.description: If set, the fog machine will only run for set number of seconds.

party_mode_seconds.title: Party Mode Seconds
party_mode_seconds.description: If set, enables party mode switch, changing every set number of seconds.

random_leds.title: Random LEDs
random_leds.description: Choose LEDs randomly instead of sequentially.
